name: Defining local environmental complex-variable
description: Local environmental complex-variable that forms the basis for separating a special major type from normal variation within a major-type group

name: Definerende lokale komplekse miljøvariabler
description: For (spesielle) hovedtyper betinget av miljøstress eller forstyrrelse, er i den definerende LKM (dLKM), det vil si den sLKM som skiller hovedtypen fra tilsvarende normale hovedtype.

name: Minor local environmental complex-variable
description: Local environmental complex-variable associated with gradient lengths between 2 and 3 EDU–E (‘substantial variation’) within a major-type

name: Major local environmental complex-variable
description: Local environmental complex-variable associated with gradient lengths that exceed 3 EDU–E (‘considerable variation’) within a major-type

name: Hovde lokale komplekse miljøvariabler
description: hLKM er angitt med rød skrift i rekkefølge etter antatt avtakende variasjon i artssammensetning forklart

name: Subordinate local environmental complex-variable
description: Local environmental complex-variable associated with gradient lengths between 1 and 2 EDU–E (‘observable variation’) within a major-type
